text: ohugen pasu pæmini janatavatada api dutayin kihipa deneku yævvemu. ovunda pæhædili sadhakayanma ovun veta gena avaha. ehet movunta pera (movunge mutun mittan) boru karamin siti dæya (enam satyayan gæna) movunda, visvasavantayin vasayen sitiye næta. simava ikmavana mevænnange hrdayan kerehi (ovunge papayanhi hetuven) me andamatama api mudra kara harinnemu
